content: this is a legal case that took place in the municipal court sesvete it involves a dispute over a coowned property consisting of a yard garage and house the case lasted for 1 year and 6 months the final resolution was that the property would be sold at a public auction and the proceeds would be divided between the coowners the respondent was also ordered to reimburse the applicant for procedural costs the court reviewed various documents appointed a construction expert and determined that a geometric division of the property is possible the respondent proposed a dissolution with payment but the court found no valid reason for it both parties requested reimbursement of costs and the court determined that the costs should be borne proportionally based on their coownership shares the applicant has already paid the costs and the respondent is ordered to reimburse half of the amount
